website_summaries.verdict: This thin, comfortable collar can be worn with your cat's standard collar and is reflective for nighttime safety.
pros: Rated for up to seven months of protection
Collar kills and discourages fleas, ticks, flea eggs, and flea larvae
Also keeps flea eggs from hatching
can be worn with existing collar
For use on cats ages 12 weeks and older
cons: Some cats have sensitivities to the collar
Be sure to wash the powder off your hands after first activating it

customer_reviews.title: Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: My cat has had wore his tick collar for about 2 weeks and received chemical burn..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY! UNSAFE
customer_reviews.text: My roommate is a vet nurse, and he checked the box after we put it on to see what ingredients were used as he knew which ones were starting to be ineffective. Turns out this particular brand uses something that's unsafe for humans and in return probably not the best for kitties/puppers. Luckily, we hadn't properly activated the collar and no harm was done, but don't make the same mistake I almost did..
customer_reviews.author: Cammi

customer_reviews.title: My poor cat
customer_reviews.text: Cat wore for 9 days until I saw this. Fleas would be better.
customer_reviews.author: AMCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Try Again
customer_reviews.text: I tried this a few weeks after using some drops that didn't work well and the cats still had a severe flea problem, even after numerous baths. The box says to allow a few days and can work for 7 months. I left the collar on for a month to give it a chance and there were fleas still jumping around near the collar.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Burn
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry I did not read the reviews. Our cats, too, had chemical burns after using this collar. Not sure why this product is still on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good for a cheap flea collar
customer_reviews.text: These work good for a cheap flea collar. If you can't afford the expensive brand these will still work well. I haven't had any issues with using them on my cats, I've had them on my cats for a couple months. None of my cats had any irritation or redness, but this really depends on the sensitivity of your pets skin. So keep a watch on them and their skin while using this in case your cat has a sensitivity. Put the end piece you cut off in your vacuum bag for an extra bonus in flea protection.
customer_reviews.author: Saraskyblue

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love how affordable these are and how well they work. We have 7 cats and with these we see no fleas. And very little ticks(the ticks there are, are dead though due to the collars). I find these tend to last more around 5 months (if my cats dont lose them in the woods) rather than the 7 months they say. But that's not an issue at all. Also the scent isnt so bad, I think it says fresh or something but it kind of reminds me a little of coconut and pineapple.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Williams

customer_reviews.title: (GRAPHIC CONTENT) my cat just died...don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this no stars, I would but this flea collar has killed my cat. He died 5 mins ago...and it’s my fault for not paying attention to the reviews and the signs that my cat was dying. PLEASE DO NOT MY THIS COLLAR
customer_reviews.author: juanita la rue

customer_reviews.title: Poison! Almost killed my cat!
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my two cats. One started acting weird a few hours later and by next morning she wouldn't eat or even glance at me when offered a treat. She sat staring at the wall like a kid in time-out. It was horrible and then it occurred to me that I had put collar on her the day before so I took it off her, brushed her meticulously and washed any residue out and within the hour she was back to my spunky two year old Whiskers! Needless to say the other cats collar came off and I sent both back with a plea to amazon not to sell these!
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work.
customer_reviews.text: My family has been putting these on my outdoor cats for 20 so years and I never had an issue. Some people claim the collar burns their cat. Maybe some cats have extra sensitivity to it but I have never seen a reaction to these collars.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!!! I bought these because the neighbor uses them and the usual topicals I get from the vet weren’t working, etc and it was peak flea season. I put one on three cats and they seized and almost died. They are STILL not right after we took the collars off and washed them and vet care, etc. DO NOT USE THESE!! I did more research after it happened and I found out they are HIGHLY toxic! Better to stick with vet approved!!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on my cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat lives inside, and I bought this flea collar. It does not work on him and now he licked all the hair off of his stomach. I'm going to find something else to use. He has lost weight. I had the yard sprayed just in case. But, again, my cat does not go outside. Some animals are extra sensitive to chemicals. People be careful with your pets. They can't talk and tell you what the problem is. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Danger
customer_reviews.text: Do not use!!! Hartz flea collar made my baby really sick and he lost his hair where the collar was. If you love your cat as much as I do, please don't use. I wouldn't give it any stars, but I had to choose one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE FOR PETS, BURNS SKIN
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. It just arrived and we placed it on our cats. They immediately started running around and crying. My husband checked the tightness of the collars, and he stated his hands were burning. I was so disappointed that i didnt check the reviews prior to purchasing. So many pet babies were harmed while using this product. I will definitely be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeeVee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product, I now have to take my cat and have him treated for chemical burn.
customer_reviews.author: angel musk

customer_reviews.title: Take out of package, stretch and sit on counter for 2 weeks before putting on cat
customer_reviews.text: Have used this family of products for over 30 years. It comes very strong, so let it air out a few weeks before putting on cat. These last a year in Maryland. I know, because I took it off cat 8 months after putting it on in March and the cat had a tick crawling on her in 2 days, have never seen a tick even after a year with a collar on. p.s. I use a black permanent marker to write our phone number on collar before putting it on her
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for awesome neighbors!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it came off. I think I hooked it up wrong after loosening it up because the next day it was gone. My fault, so I ordered another one. Before my second one came in two days later, it had another on. It wasn't the same one. This was a stray cat that I felt bad for. It seems that others are looking out for it also. So... We have a spare for the neighborhood stray. ♥️ Thank God for good folks in this world!
customer_reviews.author: darrell Foust

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase these. I love that it has a breakaway feature. My cat is easily irritated and this collar seemingly doesn’t bother him. Also it lasts longer than the box says. This product to me is better than the drops because I have small children.
customer_reviews.author: MWright

customer_reviews.title: don't work
customer_reviews.text: these seem to help for about a week but definitely were not as good as prescription flea medications. Many vets now say that they are completely ineffective in treating fleas.
customer_reviews.author: mustreadlots

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you love your cat!!
customer_reviews.text: Made my cat sick! Took her to the vet and the vet said this brand makes many cats sick. I can't believe they are allowed to sell this junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These are terrible... both my cats had awful reactions
customer_reviews.text: Both my old and my young cat had terrible reactions to these collars. Our 1 year old cat got blisters all around his neck and acted lethargic. Our older cat not only acted lethargic, but it was like he was drunk, staggering around and running into things. We removed the collars, and the next day they were acting normal again, thank goodness, but it took a long time for the blisters to heal on our baby. He still has scabs. I do not recommend even trying these on your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Marie Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: This collar has Hartz
customer_reviews.text: First time using Hartz brand but it's doing it's job and killing those little alien bugs on my Xena. She didnt seizure or foam or display negative effects from what I gathered. As I rung out and stretched this cats collar until there was enough powder then she justa fit right on her neck. Adjusting size was a cinch and the break away feature is super useful and just makes life better. Wonderful collar kills fast as heck am definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that these will actually be effective on our Florida fleas, but is reasonably priced and are used while I can get every kitty a Saresto collar orderd. I can only afford 2 of that brand a month and we have multiple pets.
customer_reviews.author: Peachyme

customer_reviews.title: Burned my cats!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try these. Horrible mistake. My oldest cat didn't even have it on for 24 hours and it burned her skin. Her hair was falling out and it was all red and swollen. I looked on my other two cats and their hair was starting to fall out, but they weren't burned yet. Needless to say that I took all three off and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: JonHeather

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss.
customer_reviews.text: As described. I took it off one of my cats bc he was having hair loss under it and when I went to take it off the other cat his hair was fine. Keep an eye on your cat. These are kinda hit or miss. Some cats have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Roo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this brand for 4 years without problem. This last time, the collar didn't do a thing and both my cats had flea infestation. Had to buy spray on shampoo and after 2 applications (so 2 weeks later) haven't gotten ridden 100% of the fleas. Also it smell strong, it gives me a headache, one can only imagine what my cats feels like wearing it 24/7 with that chemical smell,makes them really uncomfortable. Not sure I will ever buy these again...
customer_reviews.author: ALINE KEESLING

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Does nothing it says it does on the box. Against my better judgement I ignored the reviews and attempted to try this product. Do NOT buy. Waste of money. Either go to the vet or buy the more expensive kind. The flea's doesn't care about the collar. They are attacking the neck right where the collar is even more so. Very disappointed and waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! My cat told me.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great fashion statement for cats. It tells all the other cats in the neighborhood that they are loved enough that their human wants to keep them flea free!! I wish they'd come in colors so I could color coordinate with their fur.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Work okay as long as I keep house well vacuumed.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the strongest or most effective, but they help. The fleas don't die right away, but they don't like being on my cats with these collars. I vacuum and wash their bedding, and my bedding, to control. I can hardly wait for first hard freeze!!
customer_reviews.author: Eliz Shay

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: My kitties were washed out with a professional anti flea shampoo and once dried I put these collars... Several fleas around the necks the next day and following days. I will don’t waste my money on this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Always naturalwhenpossible

customer_reviews.title: Very smelly and cats do not like!  Spend extra $
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats; thought bargain price flea collar would work the same! Cats did not like smell; had a fit once collar on! I’m allergic to fleas; and my granddaughter has an outside cat and brings in the occasional flea. Spending extra money was my key to success! ( cheaper at Amazon $29-$30 more at pet stores ( I checked)!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Cecilia Costsa

customer_reviews.title: Great flea collar
customer_reviews.text: The collars are very easy to get on the cats and if they get snagged they pop right off. You can reattach the collar and put it back on. Also the collar has very little smell only up close.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Harmful and injured my cat!
customer_reviews.text: Do not use these collars!! My cat's entire throat is now rubbed raw, to the point where she had spots that were nearly bleeding!! This is after having this collar on for only 2-3 weeks. It wasn't tight on her either. I will never use these things again!
customer_reviews.author: Happily MARRIED

customer_reviews.title: the fleas are literally biting right under the collar, he's had it on for over 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Like I said.. i put these collars on my two cats. I gave them a little bit of time to 'kick in'. That was a month ago. Now, and since i put the collar on, when I am checking my white cat, I find the flea 'dirt'(aka poop) directly underneath the collar. As well as everywhere else on the cat. One would think that the fleas would at least be repelled by direct contact with the collar/chemical....maybe even stay away a couple inches... But no. They are biting and living *directly* underneath the flea collar. Don't waste your money, or your sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: hk

customer_reviews.title: these worked really well
customer_reviews.text: We have indoor/outdoor cats, and we live in the south, so fleas and ticks can be a real problem. These collars were great for our cats, unlike most dog collars these have lasted every bit as long as they were supposed to. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy and his Wife

customer_reviews.title: Old product
customer_reviews.text: I never give bad reviews. Unfortunately these collars were ineffective. I have bought this same product 8 months ago from a grocery store, and they worked well. These collars just smell like plastic. The repellent must have worn off. I purchased 3 of them. All the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A Jones

customer_reviews.title: These made my cats sick.
customer_reviews.text: The two cats I put these on have not eaten for two days and are lethargic and listless. I took them off after I realized the flea collars were making them sick. I do not know if the cats will come out of this. I would not use these, too toxic.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. We changed over to this product for our cat from a natural product we were waiting to have shipped to us. In the mean time we are now battling fleas and it’s bad!! Unfortunately, we can’t request funds back as it’s been over 30 days since purchase and it’s been 2 weeks of use now. (Thankfully other product was delivered today)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Marie

customer_reviews.title: Be careful My cat had a severe allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had to update how many stars are on here because I don't remember having given it five stars but it shows that I did. I have two cats one did fine. The other one in less than 24 hours no longer had any hair around his neck and a severe rash.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Vet said this contains TOXIC chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to see if my cat would even tolerate a collar, and then my vet warned me that this and all other Hartz products are TOXIC to animals and are known to cause neurological issues in cats! Dear god, how is this stuff on the market?!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Halligan

customer_reviews.title: NO Stars
customer_reviews.text: No stars 👎this product literally did not work, at all. I lifted the collar on my cat this morning and a colony of fleas came out from directly underneath of it. He's lost fur between his shoulders underneath of it, presumably from scratching the parasites. Does not kill fleas on contact, nor does it prevent flea infestation. Booo!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Whitesnake

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use this!
customer_reviews.text: Please do not put this on your cat! It has such a strong scent that my cat was going crazy and hiding and not even wanting to eat or drink anymore! I picked her up and noticed the smell coming off of this collar. I feel so sorry for my cat having to go through this. It has such a strong scent that cannot be good for your pet. Please avoid using this collar. I am now just going to use the drops and a soft break free reflective collar on her.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT Harms your cat within days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I found one flea on my cat. I put it one according to directions and in 3 days her fur was missing along 1/4 of her neck. Never again!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: This product was aweful!! I've used the same product for many years, however, this particular order did NOT provide the flea protections it has done in the past, resulting in serious dermatitis due to aggravated flea bites. Perhaps the formula was changed however, I will not use Hartz products again.
customer_reviews.author: Scatterling

customer_reviews.title: at first they were great, not 2-3 months later seeing flees again
customer_reviews.text: do not seem to be working very well anymore, at first they were great, not 2-3 months later seeing flees again. cats are starting to itch around the collars, also I've noticed a very distinct laziness develop in most of my cats. took collars off 2 days ago and they already seem to be perking up again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fleas seemed to like the collar...
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely nothing to help. My cat got out of the house, came back with fleas and they seemed completely unaffected by this collar. What's the point if it does nothing to deter or kill them? When I went to comb the fleas off, I found a bunch hiding directly underneath the collar itself. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Jessyca Dahlin

customer_reviews.title: DON’T USE IT ON YOUR CAT!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I’m giving this product 5 stars is because it does work. But DON’T actually put it on your cat! It will irritate and stress them out. I use these to put inside my bagless vacuum cleaner. Cut the collar in half and place it inside your vacuum, so any fleas that get vacuumed up will come in contact with the collar and be killed. But again, don’t put it on your cat, please!
customer_reviews.author: NYChomeslice

customer_reviews.title: Does not kill fleas.
customer_reviews.text: This collar does not kill fleas. My indoor cat has gotten out several times recently and I started to suspect fleas and bought this collar. Maybe it works for flea prevention, but it definitely didn’t kill the fleas already on the cat. Save your money and buy a flea shampoo (which is what I did after purchasing this collar and having the cat wear it for about a week with no results).
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Time
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time for me buying this. I love what it does to my cat fur. Her fur becomes silky smooth. So soft I love it. She is train like a dog. (Go outside to use the bathroom). It keeps the fleas away big time.
customer_reviews.author: Taira

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, not very great
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this collar to be great, but just a couple weeks in and my cats neck has two very large red sores that are raw and hairless. The collar wasn’t too tight so I know it wasn’t from him over scratching and now after doing some research about this brand, I realize this has happened to other cats. Unfortunately, I don’t recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Klein The Pom

customer_reviews.title: will not order again. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product, I ordered them and put them on my cats and within 2 weeks they were infested with fleas, and the worst part was the ring of fleas living underneath the collar, like they were happy to make their home under something that was supposed to keep them away.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Rainne

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, No Adverse Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I checked my cat and luckily no reaction, chemical burn, or rash like some reports. It smells decent and is capable of protecting your whole cats body from fleas and flea eggs, which is crucially important. Works better than topicals like Frontline at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gittings

customer_reviews.title: Really, what am I missing?
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product less stars because it is advertised as “break-away” and it IS NOT. I thought I may have missed an additional piece in the package but after checking 3 packages, it’s pretty safe to say it doesn’t exist. The photo on box and “break-away” verbiage is FALSE.
customer_reviews.author: layna davis

customer_reviews.title: Lasted maybe an hour before cat got it off
customer_reviews.text: Smelled good. Put it on my cat and it didn't even last a day before it was gone. Seemed flimsy when I put it on. Cheap plastic buckle. I'll buy a flea/tick meds in pull form so I know I get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smell is tolerable -does NOT work!!!! -I bathed the kitten and comb for fleas 3-4 times a day. House and bedding washed/cleaned/vacuum and dump canister twice a day-kitten still has fleas-not finding any with the dawn /water test in the carpet every night or sitting on floor-just in the kitten -most I comb out directly UNDER the collar. Ridiculous waste of money-moving on to Frontline or Advantage-let the research begin again -this collar is a waste of time & money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Beware unraveling collar-OUCH
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when first unraveling color, there is a staple holding the collar together and I just pricked my finger with it, bleeding all over the place and my Dad just told me we’re gonna have to chop off my finger now. Message for manufacturer: please replace staple to something less dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bezos

customer_reviews.title: Flea attractors!
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions for activation. Within an hour they were itching worse than ever. My can now has scabs from the bites right where the collar sat. How can that be? I threw all of them away and put on lemon and lavender oil. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: The strong smell~
customer_reviews.text: This collar had an annoying, string smell. My kitten spent a lot of time licking her upper chest where the collar was. I guess I didn’t have it right enough because it is now lost😑
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bass

customer_reviews.title: Whats that smell?
customer_reviews.text: I personally haven't noticed, but all of the other members of my family have said that they smell funny. Not bad or anything just and odd smell. Guess it may bother some people more then others.
customer_reviews.author: Krystin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for my cats. One of them came broken. Once on my cats they didnt seem to make a difference to the fleas at all. I even gave them a few weeks time to see if they would work. I ended up having to switch to another flea control medication.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Ehh didn't do anything... Ended up getting the right stuff from the vet, they basically explained if your cat has fleas already this isn't Great, but its okay to prevent them but far from the modt effective.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazing Bear

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't do what it is supposed to do at all. It actually got irritating to my cat because it was there in the way uncomfortable doing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L Kingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two cats - one didn't mind wearing it, but the other absolutely couldn't stand it and wouldn't stop trying to remove it. If your cat (unlike mine) is used to wearing a collar, these would probably be a great solution! It definitely took care of the problem when worn!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, my cat has somewhat quickly stopped itching overtime along with a flea shampoo bath. Worth the money and doesn't smell too bad
customer_reviews.author: Andy George

customer_reviews.title: Made my cats sick
customer_reviews.text: This feedback is in regards to the product NOT the seller. I bought 2 of these collars for my indoor cats. 24 hours after wearing them both cats are sick and vomiting. One can't keep any food down and the other is fairing a bit better but still sick. I removed the collars and washed their necks with a warm wet cloth. buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gelinas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Buy the Seresto. These worked well for 3 months then we had a flea explosion. Just bought the Seresto to replace these with.
customer_reviews.author: B. Staton

customer_reviews.title: Would be great, if I could actually put it on my cat....
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the scent on the flea and tick collar, but it’s useless since the collar came without anyway to attach it to the cat. The ‘Break-Away Collar’ clearly pictured on the front of the box was not included IN THE BOX!!!! Poor quality control for product. I’ll order another brand since Hartz, who my family has used for years, can’t seem to get the product right.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Danjou

customer_reviews.title: It looks just like the collar that I purchased for "dogs" Only difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Box says for cats and should be a break away collar. Isn't a break away collar. I ordered two cat calls and 1 dog collar - all Ultra Guard by Harts. It looks just like the collar that I purchased for "dogs" Only difference is the cat ones are rolled backwards so they want to flip over when you try to put the around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Odor diminishes over time. Easy to fasten and has a quick release clasp which is awesome for rough and tumble kitties! As for effectiveness - the collar isn't the best but it's decent considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Bruner

customer_reviews.title: No comment lol
customer_reviews.text: Honestly both my cats got it off their necks within 2 minutes and I followed the directions I made sure wasnt too loose or tight, of course. Maybe my cats are too smart for their own good. Some people swear by these, it's a damn shame.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Fleas like it
customer_reviews.text: When put on my cat, all the fleas got curious and came to see the collar, and they leave good reviews, and have no complaints, other than everyone else in my house. No irritation issues either. Now its time to get rid of fleas so ill be trying other methods.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure how long it should take to get rid of fleas but it doesn't work. My cat does not go out ever but I rescued a cat from outside and that cat has fleas and gave them to my cat and these collars does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilyn Levye

customer_reviews.title: Flea bags
customer_reviews.text: Didn't smell bad but we still were left with 2 flea bags running the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it works
customer_reviews.text: Well, is not bulky or to tight but I don't know, it doesn't seem to work at least with my cat, she still scratches que a bit, bummer
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this product for years on out outdoor kitties. It has a quick release safety feature, sometimes out kitties come to the door collarless, but it's ok. We just slap on another. We only use the collar in the warmer summer months where the risk of ticks and fleas are the highest. We haven't had any problem with them. I wish they made them for cows, horses, ex's, you know the deal. (LOL!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Katrina A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not work!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two collars, one for each cat. Both have fleas and have had to use other products to get rid of them. Very, very disappointed because I have used product in past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made cat sick
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing "non-toxic" about this collar. Cast for sick within a few hours and puked a few times. I took off collar. Cat stopped puking right away.
customer_reviews.author: Georgio

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cat watched fleas crawling on the collar itself. Didn't bother them in the least. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Really??
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my cats on June 16. It's June 28th. Fleas everywhere. Even living UNDER the collars. I want my money back!! Buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Machinator

customer_reviews.title: GET AWAY, FLEAS
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on-time! It was a little too big for our cat, but you just gotta cut it with some scissors and it fits just fine! I see a lot of stuff about cats having reactions to these, but our cat was just fine. Maybe it depends on the cat?
customer_reviews.author: SlimFreakinFast

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and highly highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love!! Use these as their collars and slide a nameplate with phone number to then. They snap off when need to (2 cats are half outdoor cats), as I have had to replace them twice because they get into all sorts of trees and things and the collar is safe to snap off and not hang them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: The collar connector broke when I was putting it on...so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Way

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Even Look Like The Picture
customer_reviews.text: I unrolled it out and there is no break-away collar feature of any kind. Instead, one end is the 2 plastic pieces together, while the other end was a staple. Freakin really? False advertisement up the a**. Never buying Hartz products again. Even the spray I bought didn't work. Waste of money, but lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: It don’t even work
customer_reviews.text: Let me know how I lift the collar from my cat and see 5 fleas just relaxing under the collar ?
customer_reviews.author: Andres Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: not made well -  buckle broke within days -
customer_reviews.text: finally found a couple of them. buckles broken so not doing the cats any good. past return date before I found them. - waste of money
customer_reviews.author: misanthrope

customer_reviews.title: No luck.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, did not work for my kitten. Her fleas will not give up and she might as well have not even been wearing this thing. The scent is pleasant and I really wish it would have worked because she hardly noticed she was wearing it. No luck, will have to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jacie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t see a difference in amount of fleas on my cats
customer_reviews.text: This collar really is great if your cat ever gets into a fight or is caught in a bush, it rips off easy so they can get away. Did NOT see a decrease in fleas on my cat. You’re better off buying some liquid medication you put between their shoulder blades. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good flea collar for price
customer_reviews.text: this is the third time we have used this collar and it seems to work well for our indoor cats. Good value over the $65 collar.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Reed

customer_reviews.title: Don't  work at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't appear to slightly slow the fleas down much less keep the off of your pet. Fact is the ones that I bought were no more effective than tying a string around their necks.
customer_reviews.author: Chasing and racing

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this product 3x, and each time it seems to work on my indoor only cat, will ntice that he starts to scratch just about the time the collar should be replaced
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jurado

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: They were bought for our cats that have fleas...It didn't even kill the fleas have to buy something more potent...Its a shame when you think they are going to help and don't...
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Willis

customer_reviews.title: Pay more to get more
customer_reviews.text: Almost too small for the cat and doesn’t work. Still has fleas. But the Vet Best flea spray works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these collars for my cat..I had to order TWO because after the first order was not received I had to order again--
customer_reviews.author: Patricia W

customer_reviews.title: An appalling waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Was beyond useless. Buying one of these is like basically admitting you are willing to live with fleas for the rest of your life.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not effective on larger cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats still have fleas- my one cat doesn’t really have many fleas but she’s super tiny around 5lbs. My male 17lb cat still has bugs and so does my thick hair Persian...
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: We have ticks very bad around where we live
customer_reviews.text: We have ticks very bad around where we live. This collar has prevented her from getting any. She hasn't gotten fleas either. Not sure why so many people are having issues with the 'burn' marks on their cat. Maybe they put it on too tight? No issues with this and I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and 2 was broke,they are replacing them,but I like the smell.I don't think I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Duwana

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't a match for us- made my cat lethargic
customer_reviews.text: Collars arrived quickly and we were excited to try them out! After two days one of our cats became extremely lethargic. We took off the collar and she returned back to normal after a few days. No other effects were noticed. We didn't mind the scent, smelled very fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend it. Ask your vet before buying.
customer_reviews.text: My cat got sick from this. Must be too strong. Did kill fleas,but almost the cat too! Ask your vet first. May be too strong for small or weak cats.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA RIVERA

customer_reviews.title: Still picking live fleas off a month in. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three to protect our three cats. They wore them for at least 3-4 weeks, and I'm still picking live fleas off of them. Yes, I did the extra step of stretch to activate. I felt the powder. I redid the activation steps for one to be sure about a week and a half in. Completely useless. Do not buy. This product does not work. This chemical combination may have worked at one time, but they do not now.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mills

product_meta.title: Hartz UltraGuard Plus Water Resistant 7 Month Protection Breakaway Flea & Tick Collar for Cats (3270094268)
product_meta.description: Tell pesky parasites to ‘bug off’ with the Hartz UltraGuard Plus Flea & Tick Collar for Cats and Kittens. This collar kills and repels both fleas and ticks for 7 months and also prevents flea eggs from hatching for over half the year - stopping the flea life cycle and inhibiting reinfestation. The water resistant design remains effective even after getting caught in the rain. Also features a breakaway safety release. For continuous flea and tick protection from head to tail, replace the collar every 7 months. For use on kittens 12 weeks of age and older. Directions: Remove collar from package, unroll and stretch to activate insecticide generator. Do not use on kittens under 12 weeks of age. Do not unroll collar until ready to use. Place the collar around the cat’s neck, adjust for proper fit and buckle in place. The collar must be worn loosely to allow for growth of the cat and to permit the collar to move about the neck. Generally, a properly fitted collar is one that, when fastened, will snugly slide over the cat’s head. Leave 2 or 3 inches on the collar for extra adjustment and cut off and dispose of the extra length. Consult a veterinarian before using this product on debilitated, aged or medicated pets. Sensitivity may occur after using any pesticide product for pets. Some animals may become irritated by the collar if it is applied too tightly. If this occurs, loosen the collar. If irritation continues, remove the collar and bathe your cat with mild soap and rinse with large amount of water. If signs continue, consult a veterinarian immediately. Do not use this product on cats simultaneously or within 30 days before or after treatment of other flea and tick products. However, flea and tick collars may be replaced immediately.
feature_bullets: Kills and repels fleas, ticks, flea eggs and flea larvae, plus prevents flea eggs from hatching for 7 months. Can be worn simultaneously with your cat's regular collar
Water-resistant design won't cause loss of effectiveness if your favorite feline takes a stroll in the rain
Features a breakaway, safety release snap
For use on adult cats and kittens 12 weeks of age and older
